definition: ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico

sentences.english: In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
sentences.chinese: 爲了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨鏡。

sentences.english: He would also wear sunglasses to hide his blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他還帶了墨鏡來遮住自己的藍眼睛。

sentences.english: Grab your shades and your sunblock.
sentences.chinese: 帶上你的墨鏡和防曬霜。

sentences.english: Wore invisible glasses wears sunglasses again, does cross-eye eyeball have disadvantage?
sentences.chinese: 戴了隱形眼鏡再戴墨鏡，對眼睛有壞處嗎？

sentences.english: Aim the vents in your car away from your eyes, or wear sunglasses as a shield.
sentences.chinese: 讓空調排風口避開你的眼睛，或帶上墨鏡保護眼睛。

sentences.english: Dressed in black for the trial, eyes hidden behind sunglasses, Linor had to be strong.
sentences.chinese: 庭審時林諾身着黑衣頭戴墨鏡，表現得很堅強。

sentences.english: Wear sunglasses, especially the darker ones.
sentences.chinese: 戴上墨鏡，特別是深色的那種，會讓你事半功倍。

sentences.english: Wear your sunglasses and sunhat before you go to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 去海灘時戴上墨鏡和遮陽帽。

sentences.english: He wore a familiar Mao-style khaki jumpsuit and dark sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着人們熟悉的卡其色中山裝，戴着墨鏡。

sentences.english: It specializes in sunglasses, leather goods, watches, shoes- you name it.
sentences.chinese: 它的產品包括墨鏡，皮革，手錶和鞋子等等。

sentences.english: To avoid being identified by his acquaintances, Wu wore a mask and a pair of dark glasses at first.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免被熟人認出來，起初吳政會帶上口罩和墨鏡。

sentences.english: The slick-looking young man in the sunglasses is playing a gangster in a fraud syndicate
sentences.chinese: 圖中戴墨鏡的光頭男子正在扮演一個歹徒。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: Wearing my camera around my neck and my dark sunglasses I looked like a typical turista.
sentences.chinese: 我的脖子上掛着相機，戴着墨鏡，一看就像個旅遊者。

sentences.english: I could see myself reflected in Dick's sunglasses. All of me.
sentences.chinese: 我能夠通過迪克的墨鏡看到自己，整個自己。

sentences.english: It is dazzled and ought to be wearing sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 它被閃花了眼，應該戴上墨鏡纔是。
